constraint.name: sfi_cliente_instalaciones_idzone_fkey
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idzone) REFERENCES sfi_zonas(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE SET NULL

constraint.name: sfi_cliente_instalaciones_idagente_fkey
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idagente) REFERENCES sfi_agentes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE SET NULL

constraint.name: sfi_cliente_instalaciones_idproducto_fkey
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idproducto) REFERENCES sfi_productos(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE SET NULL

constraint.name: sfi_cliente_instalaciones_idagente_fkey
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idagente) REFERENCES sfi_agentes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE SET NULL
